features: 【BLACK MASK & TEA TREE SERUM KIT】 - The best SHVYOG blackhead remover mask makes your daily skin care routine complete. This new upgrade combination contains blackhead peel off mask and natural tea tree repairing serum for your convenience. Comes with a brush to help charcoal face mask application. Our black mask can be gifted to women, men and be a gifts to yourself.

【DEEP CLEANSING MASK KIT】 - The powerful activated charcoal face mask works strong and deeply to get rid of blackheads, impurities, dirt, acne and excess oil. After peel off mask apply the tea tree serum to helps repairing & relaxing redness skin, mainly helps shrinking the large pores to make your face keep soft and smooth.

【SKIN PURIFYING & ANTI AGING】 - This charcoal peel off face mask contains powerful bamboo extracts that can easily remove pore-clogging dirt and extra oils, effectively preventing blackheads and tightening your skin. Regular usage tightens pores and provides firm and youthful and healthy skin. A perfect gift set for women, men or anyone you loved.

【FOR ALL SKIN TYPES USE】 - Our blackhead peel off mask infused with natural and safe ingredients is good for all skin types, apply the blackhead mask over your face (avoid applying on eyes, brows, and lips), allow the mask to dry off then peel off after 20-25 minutes. For better results, apply the tea tree serum afterwards. You can give the black mask gift kit to anyone one you loved in any festival.

【100% SATISFACTION】 - Please assure that we always stand behind our blackhead peel off mask. Should you for any reason be unhappy with your purchase, we provide you excellent customer support, please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to resolve your issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SHVYOG PEEL OFF FACE MASK KIT IS THE BEST GIFT CHOICE FOR WOMEN AND MEN !

SHVYOG BLACKHEAD PEEL OFF MASK WITH TEA TREE REPAIRING SERUM GIFT KIT SHVYOG Blackhead Remover Mask gently yet powerfully peel away your blackheads, pore-clogging dirt, dead skin cells and extra oils. With SHVYOG Tea Tree Serum that infused with 100% Australian tea tree oil, brings moisturizing, smoothing and radiant skin for you.

DEEP CLEANSING FACIAL MASK GIFT KIT WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS Activated charcoal quickly and effectively remove blackheads, impurities, acne and excess oi from the face and helps skin regeneration. Natural tea tree oil serum with hazel tones, chamomile to helps repairing & relaxing redness skin, mainly helps shrinking the large pores to make your face keep soft and smooth.

2-IN -1 PERFECT COMBINATION GIFT SET FOR CHARCOAL PEEL OFF FACE MASK The best SHVYOG charcoal pore cleansing face mask makes your daily skin care routine complete. This new upgrade combination contains activated charcoal black mask and natural tea tree repairing serum for your convenience. Comes with a brush to help charcoal cleansing face mask application.

HOW TO USE ? STEP 1 Cleansing face and apply a warm towel over face for few minutes to open pores. STEP 2 Apply an even layer of black mask focused on areas with blackheads. STEP 3 Wait for 20-25 mins and gently peel mask off start from the bottom of the mask. STEP 4 Cleansing face again, then apply a proper amount of Tea Tree Serum on skin and gently massage until fully absorbed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love this stuff. the brush thing to put it on is amazing and the mask itself has so far worked so well. I love that it comes with tea tree oil—takes it a step further and does wonders for your skin.I’m prone to blackheads so this was a great price for something that has actually been able to help me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As you can see from my pictures, it pulls junk from your pours. The worst part is the peeling off process, it's not fun at all! My face is red afterwards as well, which isn't appealing, but expected after pulling this mask off. The first picture of my face is before the mask the second one (where its really red) is after. I feel like my face looks fresher and my pours clearer. I did use the tree tea oil after, as well as a vitamin c oil, collagen oil, and a retinal oil as well and a moisturizer after peeling the mask. I would recommend... but please beware! It hurts peeling it off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does work, bad reviews are not irrelevant but here is what you need to know.
reviews.reviewText: I almost did not purchase this product due to the bad reviews but I decided to go ahead and give it the benefit of the doubt and try it for myself and here is what I found.As you can see in the picture it does leave some redness behind (I have sensitive skin), my cheeks are a little tingly and a bit itchy but overall just fine and they feel sooo soft now. Also the tingling and itchiness subsides after about 10 minutes.You must follow the directions precisely. In them it says, use on areas with blackheads and large pores. I take this to mean do not use it on your entire face and leave the more sensitive areas of your face out when you apply this mask. As you can see, my chin is of normal coloration while my cheeks are a bit red, this is because my cheek skin is more sensitive than my chin skin.Side note, I left it on for about 35 minutes total, I would not suggest leaving it on for any longer than that. If it still isn't dry after that amount of time, you've applied too thick of a layer.And lastly the directions say to use a thin layer, literally as much as you need to cover the skin without seeing it through the mask is enough. It did not remove every single blackhead but it removed about 90% of them and I could have left a warm cloth on longer than I did.So overall this product is good, the tea tree oil is very soothing and makes your skin feel softer. The mask itself works if you use it properly and don't leave it on for too long. It did not hurt my face at all when I peeled it off, I would assume the people having issues with pain and skin rashes and skin coming off have used way too thick of a layer than they should have and possibly left it on too long. Another possibily is an allergic reaction to a chemical in the product.I gave this product 4 stars because it does it's job but does leave redness in sensitive areas. My face, being sensitive is already prone to redness and it is not severe in any way so I believe it will fade very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the SHVYOG Blackhead Peel Off Face Mask, and it's an okay product, in my opinion. Here's what I found:1. **Effective Blackhead Removal**: The mask did a decent job of removing some blackheads and impurities from my skin. It left my face feeling somewhat smoother.2. **Convenient Set**: I appreciated that it came with a brush and tea tree oil serum. The brush made application easier, and the serum added a nice touch to my skincare routine.3. **Peel-Off Experience**: The peel-off process was relatively painless, and I didn't experience any discomfort while removing the mask.However, I did have a few concerns:1. **Limited Results**: While it did remove some blackheads, I didn't see a significant improvement in my skin's overall texture or clarity. It didn't fully meet my expectations in terms of addressing blackheads and impurities.2. **Scent**: The mask has a strong scent that I found a bit overpowering. It might not be suitable for those with sensitivity to scents.3. **Messy Application**: Despite the brush, the application process can still get messy. It's important to apply it evenly to avoid uneven peeling.In conclusion, the SHVYOG Blackhead Peel Off Face Mask is an okay option if you're looking for a basic blackhead removal product with added convenience. While it did provide some results, it didn't entirely meet my skincare expectations. It might work better for individuals with less stubborn blackheads or those looking for a simple addition to their skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets all the gunk out!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time using this brand for a peel off blackhead mask and it does the job! Keep in mind, so see a real difference, you have to do this at least twice a week. Keep in mind, I took was after one use of this product. 10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This actually works really well…. I was scared to get it because I seen all the comments saying it didn’t work… BUT! If you leave it on for as long as it says on the container which isssss 30-35 min then it really does work!! And leaves my skin smooth😁👌🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars worst peel off mask i've bought to date
reviews.reviewText: I bought this back at the end of october when the peel mask i normally use ran out. Used it twice since then. Didn't have the hard time peeling it off like everyone else seems to have had, hut have had a really bad breakout since using it on my chin and cheeks that has now lasted a month and a half. I haven't used the mask again since the second time, afraid of making the breakout worst, and plan on throwing the box out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great blackhead mask
reviews.reviewText: I used the mask to help pull out some stubborn blackheads. I used per product instructions & It worked very well for me. I was easy to apply and remove. It even left my face feeling fresh with a good scent.Recommended.

Bonjour, au début j'étais sceptique car en regardant les avis j'ai remarqué que la plupart des personnes n'étaient pas d'accord mais quand je l'ai essayé j'ai été surpris, il fonctionne super bien, je recommande.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the blackhead peel-off face mask, and I'm thrilled with the results. This mask is like a mini spa treatment at home. It's easy to apply and dries fairly quickly, making the experience convenient and hassle-free.The best part? It effectively removes blackheads and leaves my skin feeling incredibly smooth and refreshed. The peel-off process is oddly satisfying, and I can see the gunk it pulls out from my pores. It doesn't irritate my skin and doesn't leave any residue behind.For anyone looking to address blackheads and improve the overall texture of their skin, this face mask is a fantastic choice. It's an affordable and effective way to achieve cleaner, smoother skin. I'm definitely making it a regular part of my skincare routine. High recommendation!
Removing very good (above 90% success for 1st use)..very good accessories..love to use it again
Masque super , bien lécher sécher , retire bien les point noir et duvet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Don't leave it on too long
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant cleansing, but if it gets too dry it can be hard to get a grip on to peel off. Watch your eyebrows too 👀
